item.description:
Facebook invite: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=195933777090402

The music!

http://ensmb.com/ 

http://deboband.com/

http://tomnmusic.com/ 

http://afrobrazil.org/

 

Put on your masks to kick-off Carnival at the interstellar, multi-cultural party of the year with Emporer Norton's Stationary Marching Band, Debo Band, T?mn, and Marcus Santos' AfroBrazil.

The Countdown to Carnival Masquerade at the Middle East Downstairs will happen on Friday, 2/25 and will feature Mardi Gras brass band explosions, Ethiopian trance grooves, Braz-American Rock music sandwiches, and an Brazilian Samba dance party with a cherry on top.

Get your discounted tickets in advance below or from me and pay $10: http://www.ticketweb.com/t3/sale/SaleEventDetail?dispatch=loadSelectionData&eventId=3350055&REFID=elink&pl=mideastclub

It’s going to be a raucous occasion to dress up and celebrate the start of Carnival, Mardi Gras, Saturnalia or whatever you fancy. Whether you have an elegant Venetian mask or some zany Brazilian headwear, sport it and come dance. "Bunda" means bum bum in Portuguese. It's your job to bring it and shake it.

Friday, February 25th 9 PM

The Middle East Downstairs

480 Mass. Ave (Central Sq.) Cambridge, MA

18+ $10 advance/ $12 day of show
item.why: Amigos! There is an awesome party I am organizing to kick-off the Carnival season at The Middle East and I wanted to invite everyone. The night will feature AfroBrazil, Tomn (that's me), Debo Band, and Emperor Norton's Stationary Marching Band.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Countdown to Carnival Masquerade w/AfroBrazil+Tomn+Debo Band+ENSMB
